item.title: SWN
item.description: score:-49 Chances: Southwestern Energy’s higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases bode well for its future performance. The longer-term bull case for natural gas, which is the primary focus of Southwestern Energy’s operations, rests on expanding U.S. exports. Risks: The stock price of Southwestern Energy is sensitive to the significantly high institutional ownership, which may lead to volatility based on their actions.
